snippet: Mr. Garrett was an authority on decorative arts and known to the public as an appraiser on the PBS series “Antiques Roadshow.”
abstract: Wendell D Garrett, authority on American decorative arts and key presence on PBS television series Antiques Roadshow, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Garrett was an authority on decorative arts and known to the public as an appraiser on the PBS series “Antiques Roadshow.”

headline.seo: Wendell D. Garrett, Decorative Arts Expert on ‘Antiques Roadshow,’ Dies at 83
headline.main: Wendell D. Garrett, Expert on Americana, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Wendell D. Garrett, Expert On Americana, Dies at 83
